body: Erica's extreme clumsiness are causing the cats enormes debts, which the team (or should I better say Lobelia-san) decides to pay off by renting Erica to some depraved sex club. Immediately Erica gets brutally deflowered in every hole but the party spins out of control. Coquelicot and Hanabi are turing out to be frivolous sluts. Glycine (highborn noble bitch) gets equally brutally deflowered as Erica. And Lobelia-san just does normal business, wondering how everything could spin that much out of control. Wish there was more of Lobelia-san asNekoi Mie not only draws her very nicley but also gave some unique action (seriously she threatens the guy not to come to early and seems to be a pro with mouth and fingers). The costume of the cats are also perfectly in character. Overall: Perfect.
